com.eco.bio7.rbridge

Class RServe

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eco.bio7.rbridge.RServe

  • public class RServe
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for the communication with the Rserve application.
    Author:
    Bio7

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateExt

        public static void evaluateExt(java.lang.String expression)
        Evaluates an R expression without running in a job. This method can be used to evaluate R scripts from e.g. Groovy (running already in a job). R plots a possible, too.
        Parameters:
        expression - a R expression.

      • printJob

        public static void printJob(java.lang.String expression)
        Evaluates and prints an expression to the Bio7 console executed in a job.
        Parameters:
        expression - a R expression as a string.

      • printJobs

        public static void printJobs(java.lang.String[] expressions)
        Evaluates and prints an array of expressions to the Bio7 console executed in a job.
        Parameters:
        expressions - a R expression as a string.

        inchy - the height of the plot in inch units.

      • setPlotPixel

        Set the plot size in pixel for a png plot.
        Parameters:
        imageWidth - the width of the plot in pixel units.
        imageHeight - the height of the plot in pixel units.

        A method to call a RScript.
        Parameters:
